Sentencas: Galliosilicate glasses were developed for sealing intermediate temperature planar solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) stacks.
Titulo: Galliosilicate glasses for viscous sealants in solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Part I: Compositional design

Sentencas: Candidate sealing glasses were identified for use at operating temperatures of 750 degrees C and at 850 degrees C after assessing flow behavior, thermal expansion properties, and crystallization behavior.
Titulo: Galliosilicate glasses for viscous sealants in solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Part I: Compositional design

Sentencas: A series of non-alkali glasses was identified for use at 750 degrees C within a strontium boro-galliosilicate compositional region that exhibited glass transition temperatures (T-g) between 658 and 675 degrees C and coefficients of thermal expansion (CTE) between 8 and 9.4 x 10(-6) K-1.
Titulo: Galliosilicate glasses for viscous sealants in solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Part I: Compositional design

Sentencas: Glass fits and powders flowed below 850 degrees C and did not crystallize dramatically after 500 h at 750 C. Several glasses containing 5 mol% mixed alkali were identified in a strontium boro-galliosilicate compositional region for use at 850 degrees
Titulo: Galliosilicate glasses for viscous sealants in solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Part I: Compositional design
Galliosilicate glasses for viscous sealants in solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Part I: Compositional design

Sentencas: The glasses exhibited T-g between 615 and 620 degrees C with CTE from 7.8 to 9.7 x 10(-6) K-1.
Titulo: Galliosilicate glasses for viscous sealants in solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Part I: Compositional design

Sentencas: Glass fits flowed well below 850 degrees C and retained remnant glass phase after partial crystallization at 850 degrees C.
Titulo: Galliosilicate glasses for viscous sealants in solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Part I: Compositional design

Sentencas: The galliosilicate glasses developed in this work enable viscous sealing of SOFC stacks.
Titulo: Galliosilicate glasses for viscous sealants in solid oxide fuel cell stacks: Part I: Compositional design
